Package controller

Class CreateRecurringEventCommand

java.lang.Object
controller.CreateRecurringEventCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class CreateRecurringEventCommand extends Object implements Command
Creates a recurring event in the calendar.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • CreateRecurringEventCommand

      public CreateRecurringEventCommand(ICalendarService service, boolean autoDecline, String subject, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, String description, String location, boolean isPublic, Set<DayOfWeek> recurrenceDays, int occurrenceCount, LocalDate recurrenceEndDate)
      Constructor of the class.
      Parameters:
      service - The calendar service to manage the event
      autoDecline - Whether to automatically decline conflicting events
      subject - The title or name of the event
      start - The start date and time of the first occurrence
      end - The end date and time of each occurrence
      description - A brief description of the event
      location - The location where the event will take place
      isPublic - Whether the event is visible to others
      recurrenceDays - The days of the week when the event repeats
      occurrenceCount - The number of times the event should occur

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public String execute() throws Exception
      Executes the recurring event creation by adding it to the calendar.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Command
      Returns:
      A message confirming the recurring event was created
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during event creation
